    ETHIOPIAN VETERINARY ASSOCIATION - NEW COOPERATIVE MEMBERS REGISTRATION FORM

     

    Dear all respected!

    This is the official portal for the registration of new members for the Ethiopian Veterinary Association (EVA). We would like to thank you for choosing to join EVA.

    We look forward to a collaborative endeavor to progress the Livestock sector, The Veterinary Profession, Animal and Public Health.

    EVA Secretariat

    2023

    General Instruction

    According to Article 6 of EVA by-law, Cooperative member is: An apprentice and a veterinarian candidate; Professionals who are operating the veterinary and related activities such activities approved by the management board to meet the objectives of the association or could be supporting organizations.

     

    Thus, for organizations wishing to become members of EVA, kindly make sure that you have fulfilled the following document before progressing in filling out the registration form.

    • Make ready scanned copy of your organization's License / certificate - in PDF format
    • Scanned registration fee receipt or if you are using the mobile banking, the transaction Number.

    Please note that, for new corporate members the registration fee is 2,000 ETB , and the yearly membership fee is also 2,000 ETB.

     

    Please forward your membership fee to the following bank account of Ethiopian Veterinary Association:

    Bank Name: Commercial Bank of Ethiopia (CBE)

    Swift Code: CBETATAA

    Account Number: 1000050555333

    Account Holderâ€™s Name: Ethiopian Veterinary Association

    Bank Branch Address: Addis Ababa, Cape Verde Street

    Bank Country and City: Addis Ababa, Ethiopia

     

    For more information, you may reach us through:

    Phone Number:

    Tel 1: (+251)15 525020 or

    Tel 2: (+251) 18 697868

    Email: ethiopianveterinaryassociation@gmail.com

    Cooperate member registration form

    Detail about your organization

    In this section you will be required to provide the name of your organization, the type of organization (whether it is governmental or private) and a brief of what your institute does.

     

    Address of your Organization

     

    Organization's Representative

    Details of the person representing your organization, who could be president, CEO, director, manager or any other delegate who could be contacted on different matters.

    Membership fee

    Dear applicant, the registration fee for cooperative members is 2,000 Ethiopian Birr. Kindly, transfer the payment to the bank account of Ethiopian Veterinary Association, indicated below :

    Bank Name: Commercial Bank of Ethiopia

    Bank Branch Address: Addis Ababa, Cape Verde Street

    Swift Code: CBETATAA

    AccountNumber:1000050555333

    Account Holderâ€™s Name: Ethiopian Veterinary Association

    Once you have made the payment, please sent us the scanned copy of your bank receipt or screen shoot of the mobile banking payment receipt (if you have used the mobile banking).

     

    Please note that, your registration will only be complete after a payment receipt is received by the association.

    confirmation

    I have carefully read the Ethiopian Veterinary Association constitution as amended at the meeting held from 19-20 June 1992, in Addis Ababa and I fully agree to be bound to the rules and regulations of the Association.

    With this in mind, I apply*
